title: Brother takes his own life months after sister’s suicide
text:
A grieving brother haunted by his little sister’s suicide has killed himself.

Dyllon Beadle (21) was found dead at his home in Manchester, England, two months before the anniversary of his younger sister Quinn’s suicide, Metro UK reports.

“Our beautiful son Dyllon decided that this world was just too cruel for him,” said his mother, Tracey.

“He took the awful decision to take his own life just as his little sister Quinn did in December.”

Quinn was only 17 years old when she was found hanging from a tree and Tracey says her death hit the family hard, Sun UK reports.

The family launched a charity in her name called Quinn’s Retreat, to help other families going through the same situation.

“Dyllon was a leading force in setting up Quinn’s Retreat and was a proud trustee,” Tracey revealed.

“I think it would be fitting to raise some much-needed funds for Quinn’s Retreat in memory of our amazing son Dyllon.”

The grieving mom and her husband, David, said they’d scatter both Dyllon and Quinn’s ashes together at Dyllon’s funeral and will rename the charity to Quinn and Dyllon’s Retreat.

Sources: Metro UK, Sun UK
description: A grieving brother haunted by his little sister’s suicide has killed himself.
